name: What is a Cloud Engineer
description: Learn about the cloud engineer role, what they do day-to-day, and how to become one.

learning_steps.text: Watch: What is a Cloud Engineer
learning_steps.title: What is a Cloud Engineer
learning_steps.description: Discover what cloud engineers do, what skills they need, and the path to becoming one.

Cloud engineering requires continuous learning and problem-solving. Consider: Do you enjoy figuring out how things work? Are you comfortable with change? Can you commit to learning new technologies regularly?

questions.prompt: Describe what a cloud engineer does day-to-day and the typical responsibilities of the role.
What technical skills would you prioritize when building toward a cloud engineering career?

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you ask me what a cloud engineer does day-to-day?
Can you quiz me on the skills needed to become a cloud engineer?
Can you ask me why I want to become a cloud engineer?

learning_objectives.text: Understand what cloud engineers do day-to-day
Know the skills and certifications that matter
Understand the career path and growth opportunities
